title: EaSe
author: EaSe
content: Hi,I have a 3060ti LHR V2 and today I tested the new versions of T-Rex, NbMiner and Nicehash(Quickminer).after less than 2 minutes the screen goes black, sound continues normally. After that either the PC restarts or the miner crashes and the pc works again.MSI Afterburner Settings:https://ibb.co/qryGV5qhas worked for me until now with the old Versions with 70% unlock and 40 Mhs.with the new Versions i have the full 55-59Mhs but i crashes after less than 2 minutes.Now the funny thing, even completely without OC it crashes, then I tried times only times to turn down the power limit, crashtried older driver, no help, tried non DCH driver, no helpPS: GPU Temp on 50-55 and Hotspot not higher than 65does anyone know what could be the reason for this?Greetings

comments.author: EaSe
comments.body: Yeah, i have 512.77 like recommended on T-Rex on Github. My OC settings were constantly good with the older Version of Nicehash or T-Rex with their 70% unlock. When i set my Memory Clock on anything over 1150, it is unstable or crashes instantly. My Card is OC from stock. Thats why i chose this oc profile.And like i said, it even crashes even without any oc or only Power limit set on like 75.
